alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 08 at 11:07PM MST until November 10 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MST Wednesday. For the High Wind Watch, from 6 AM MST Wednesday through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
